(Simplified: 鼹)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 匽 indicates the sound; 鼠 (rat) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 鼠 [ shǔ ] rat, mouse
    • 匽 [ yǎn ] to hide, to repress; to bend
①(鼴鼠)哺乳動物，長十餘釐米，毛黑褐色，趾有鉤爪，善掘土，白天住在土中，夜晚捕食昆蟲，也喫農作物的根。俗稱“地排子”。
鼴鼠 [ yǎn shǔ ]: mole (zoology)
鼴鼠皮 [ yǎn shǔ pí ]: moleskin

鼴字的基本解释

鼴
yǎn
同“鼹”。

鼴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》於幰切，上阮，影。］
亦作“鼹1”。
(1)鼠的一类。
(2)见“鼴鼠”。

鼴字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼴； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1529第10
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】於幰切【集韻】隱幰切，?音偃。【玉篇】大鼠也。【廣韻】似鼠形，大如牛，好偃河而飮水。　又【正韻】鼠名。一曰鼢。【正字通】鼴，似鼠而小，無尾，黑色長鼻，一名鼢。以其常偃伏名鼴，以其隂穿地中而行名隱鼠，以其起地若耕名犂鼠，鼴則通稱也。　又【集韻】於蹇切，音嫣。義同。　亦作偃。【莊子·逍遙遊】作偃。

mole
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼹; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1529 No. 10
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Yu Jiaqie [Ji Yun] Hidden Yunqie,? Yinyan. [Jade articles] Rats too. 【Guangyun】Like a mouse, as big as a cow, it's good for a river and water.　[Zhengyun] The name of the mouse. One said the shank. [Zhengzitong] Mole, small like a mouse, without a tail, black proboscis, and a constrictor. It is called the mole for its constant lofting, and the name of the hidden mouse for its shadow to walk through the ground, and the name of the plow mouse for its rise in the ground. The mole is also known as the common name.　[Jiyun] Yu Jianqie, Yinyan. The same meaning.　 Also for Yan. [Zhuangzi·Xiaoyaoyou] Zuoyan.
